radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar dependent atelectasis noted, otherwise clear lung bases, no pleural effusion. Normal heart size, liver enhances homogeneously, gallbladder incompletely distended with no acute inflammation, spleen unremarkable, pancreas normal, kidneys enhance without evidence of hydronephrosis, appendix dilated up to 12 mm with mural edema and a punctate appendicolith, mild periappendiceal fat stranding, no evidence of appendiceal rupture or abscess. Pelvic structures unremarkable, no free air or fluid, no lymphadenopathy. Osseous structures normal.
